desc: Yamoa™ is an effective alternative approach to managing chronic respiratory ailments such as asthma, hay fever, a persistent cough, bronchitis, repeat pneumonia infections and COPD. Yamoa™ is a 100% natural, additive-free, vegan food supplement made of from the bark of the West African Funtumia elastica gum tree.

layout.text:
Stop being
struck down
by asthma

Yamoa is a traditional remedy
that helps your body fight the effects
of asthma and respiratory allergies
